website_summaries.verdict: While it has a small capacity, this machine is efficient and simple to use.
pros: Top-loading washing machine and spin dryer in 1
Features a rotary control wash timer and a see-through top
Machine is both energy and water efficient
Washer capacity is 7.7 pounds, while the spinner can hold 3.3 pounds
cons: both the washer and spinner hold less than other options

customer_reviews.title: We’re military and needed something to wash our clothes with ...
customer_reviews.text: We’re military and needed something to wash our clothes with. We bought this and sent it with our advanced items and didn’t have to bother with the laundry mat. Wash our clothes, spin the water out, hang to dry. Saved us tons of money. Took 7 weeks for our household goods to arrive to Hawaii. Don’t expect to do large loads or the dryer to dry your clothes completely. It just spins out the water then you air dry them.
customer_reviews.author: CallieStewartWalker

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well, perfect for RV or apt.
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!!! I honestly was expecting some cheapie Chinese low grade stuff but was pleasantly surprised. Nice sturdy ABS plastic build, separate washer and extractor motors. It does have its downside like manual drain and fill and small extractor area but it is what it is. A perfect unit for any camper or small apartment. Nice and quiet as well. I bought for my RV but I will say I sure wish I had this unit when I was apartment living. Also great for students😁
customer_reviews.author: geoffrey walker

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely easy to use and washes pretty good! Use a good detergent and don't overfill it because it's not a large washer and you'll be good to go no more trips to the laundry mat/ family members during this time of covid . It actually could save lives because your not being exposed to others and your washing in the privacy of your home ! It's worth it get it like yesterday!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Washington

customer_reviews.title: Washtub & Washboard Would Be Better Than This
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable washer to be a stop gap with my regular washing machine being broken. The washer tub did not agitate at all. My clothes just sat in soapy water for 15 minutes. The drain hose also leaked and needs to be either placed flat or in a downward position to drain. Very messy! I am planning on returning the product. Also, the manufacturer included a flier for support with the address of pyleusa.com/support which does not work. There is not a support feature on pyleusa.com and this product is not listed at all on the site.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M.
